Topic.Title: How do you unlock an exit after you pick something up?

Posts.EditableText:
Lock exit
take potion bag
Unlock exit
Something like that?
I'd figure you'd have to edit the take or drop something somehow, but I don't know how.
Posts.HTML:
Lock exit
take potion bag
Unlock exit
Something like that?
I'd figure you'd have to edit the take or drop something somehow, but I don't know how.

Posts.EditableText: On the _Inventory_ tab, go to the "After taking the object" bit (only appears if object can be taken is ticked), and add an Unlock Exit script.
Posts.HTML: On the Inventory tab, go to the "After taking the object" bit (only appears if object can be taken is ticked), and add an Unlock Exit script.
